com.limelight.videosdk.utility

Class Setting

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.limelight.videosdk.utility.Setting

  • public class Setting
extends java.lang.Object
    This class manages the developer details like organization id, access key and secret. This class initializes and stores device id. This class also manages widevine specific settings. Developer can access the APIs exposed to set the values.
    Author:
    kanchan

      • configureAccount

        public static void configureAccount(java.lang.String id,
                    java.lang.String key,
                    java.lang.String secret)
        To set the developer account details like organization id, access key and secret.
        Parameters:
        id - organization id
        key - access key
        secret - secret

      • configureLimelightSettings

        public static void configureLimelightSettings(java.lang.String apiEndPoint,
                              java.lang.String licenseProxy,
                              java.lang.String portalKey)
        To set widevine specific details like, Limelight API endpoint, License proxy address and portal key
        Parameters:
        apiEndPoint - ApiEndPoint
        licenseProxy - LicenseProxy
        portalKey - PortalKey

      • getDeviceID

        public static java.lang.String getDeviceID(android.content.Context ctx)
        To create a new device id if it does not exist, then store it and returns it in subsequent requests. Device id is required for making requests to DRM engine in case of Widevine content.
        Parameters:
        ctx - context

      • isAccountConfigured

        public static boolean isAccountConfigured(java.lang.String... values)
        To check if the LimelightVideoSDK has got developer details from developer application. If developer details are not supplied then error message will be sent to application when application requests to fetch any data from Limelight server.
        Parameters:
        values - developer account details
        Returns:
        true if account configured else false
